website_summaries.verdict: While the Lyric has a ton of potential, the app needs some major updates to make its usability and performance on par with the Nest.
pros: Whatever your schedule, the Lyric can use its 500-foot or 7-mile adjustable geofencing feature to adapt to it
The thermostat and app are clear design upgrades from the brand's Wi-Fi Smart thermostats
cons: The thermostat isn't compatible with certain routers, it periodically shifted to Away mode when I was home, and the app doesn't always label your heating and cooling status, making at-a-glance monitoring of your Home or Away settings a real challenge

customer_reviews.title: Already starting to save me money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great looking thermostat. If you need one, this is the way to go. You're already going to spend 40 or 50 bucks, go for it and get one that will last a while and really look nice. It doesn't need any programming, you just set some configurations on the app for your phone and it does the rest. It can tell when you're home and will adjust the temp accordingly. You can also set it through the thermostat itself. It's already started to save me money by keeping the temps at the appropriate level and not heat the house when no one is home. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: A great thermostat, going on 2.5 years now
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat has been fantastic. The Wi-Fi reception is good, the software and features are excellent. Scheduling is flexible. I do have a C-wire, so I haven't experienced any of the problem people mention that are related to that. My only complaint is that there's no way to turn the fan on from the thermostat's interface--you have to use the app.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rathjen

customer_reviews.title: At first I was unsure about the Lyric - but now I love it. The geofencing works great for us because ...
customer_reviews.text: We tried the Nest before we switched to the Lyric but the wiring in our house was not compatible. At first I was unsure about the Lyric - but now I love it. The geofencing works great for us because I have no consistent schedule. I am in and out of the house randomly so the idea of a schedule being created is just not practical. With the Lyric I just have to keep the bluetooth on my phone on and I am set. The app is easy to use, virtually no learning curve if you are at all familiar with phone apps.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: but it does work well and is easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It's no nest, but it does work well and is easy to install. The set up process could use a little work and it would be nice if the app had a few more features. This could likely be fixed through software updates, but it feels (I don't know) that Honeywell isn't planning to put the engineering and development into this product that the nest people do. By the way, the backlight LED is super cool and probably my favorite feature of the look.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, except maybe as a paperweight.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Has broken 4 times in 4 years. The attitude I get from Honeywell customer support has been, wait, you expected this thing to work?” Also, they say it requires a C wire despite being marketed as not requiring one.
customer_reviews.author: M. OMALLEY

customer_reviews.title: I will say that the customer service has been good and they just offered to replace it with a ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this thermostat for 6 months and cannot get the thing to function properly. I have spent soooo many hours on the phone with Honeywell troubleshooting and trying to get it to link up with the app and our wifi. I will say that the customer service has been good and they just offered to replace it with a new one to see if we can work the bugs out! I will update when we get the new one if we find it any better. Really hoping we just got a dud because we love the idea of the geofencing!
customer_reviews.author: Mamato2

customer_reviews.title: ... over the Nest primarily for the geofencing and the Fine Tune feature that takes into account the indoor humidity ...
customer_reviews.text: I went with the Lyric over the Nest primarily for the geofencing and the Fine Tune feature that takes into account the indoor humidity and outdoor temperature when regulating the indoor temp on your home. I installed it a couple of weeks ago with no issues. Very straightforward in my application and it works just as it should. I like the look of it, the smart features and also enjoy the Amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Geotagging is awesome. My client was very happy
customer_reviews.text: Geotagging is awesome. My client was very happy. Only issue that I see is that there is no functionality in the actual interface. Like, cool - It can show me the weather on the thermostat interface. But I can't control the fan from it? Pft. I do love honeywell controllers, though. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AlexBaconFit

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!!  Not worth the time and headache.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!!! And if you do install immediately. I waited, installed it, it worked for a week and now won't turn on. Seller won't take it back because its past the 30 days. NOT WORTH IT, you will have to buy a new Router to make this work and even then its spotty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Old Device good luck getting it to work or $ back from Kelly's bookstore
customer_reviews.text: Product never worked out the box. Avoid this model. The 2.0 is the newest model for "Lyric Round" does work and is supported by Honeywell. I will never do business with Kelly's Bookstore again. Worst Amazon experience ever. Amazon rectified Kelly's Bookstore's lack of professionalism. Product still sucks and they know it too.
customer_reviews.author: Prodigal Son

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Always have to re confit the wifi setting in this. Move on. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Almost there, needs detailed usage reports and a web interface.
customer_reviews.text: A Web app would be a welcome addition, however, as would detailed heating and cooling usage reports. Hopefully these are added in future releases of the App and includes a web interface with reporting. Comfort and circulation settings are helpful, still wish it was a little smarter to allow temperature to float a little more with external information. It can be configured in ways that will use more energy than a conventional thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Energy Saving!
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these for our home. we especially like geo fence feature. When you leave the are you designate it turns off and when you enter our designated area it will automatically turn on. great energy saving. We like the smart home feature. We also bought two for our lake house
customer_reviews.author: Tess Gallivan

customer_reviews.title: Best Wifi Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I have one for upstairs and another for my downstairs. I looked at the Nest, but bought the Lyric for the geo fencing. Shortly after I bought these they updated the app to allow for more distance options. I have mine set to 4 miles and have been extremely pleased with the performance. Easy setup and install using the Lyric app and when I had to change routers I was able to change the wifi settings and keep all of my settings for each thermostat. I also like the styling and the backlighting when I change settings.
customer_reviews.author: P. McLester

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. A little sketchy with the geofencing but hopefully
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A little sketchy with the geofencing but hopefully, with an update, the issues will be resolved. All other aspects of this items work perfectly. Functionality is excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scodd

customer_reviews.title: Good product, does the job, it's just boring.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and I bought a Nest 2. I returned the Lyric, the Nest is just better and more versatile. One thing to look out for is the early Lyrics have an issue of not sitting against the wall correctly, mine had that issue. It wobbled. Not a huge deal, just annoying. The lack of IFTTT integration was another strike against. I really like the idea of geo-fencing, Lyric does it, Nest doesn't unless you get a third party app. The app was five bucks, I bought the app. Lyric is fine if you don't really want to play around with it, but Nest is just a better experience. One but plus though, Honeywell customer service is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Xtra

customer_reviews.title: No more cold or hot days or wasted heat/cold
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly and once Smartthings updated their code, it worked with that also. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Double Z

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this second one. Still have not got ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this second one. Still have not got the geosensing working yet. not too important for me, so not bothered for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Yu

customer_reviews.title: look out for the "hook"  Lyric RCH9300WF Wi-Fi Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it looks, but the reason i give it 3 stars because the Lyric App does not support Android 6.0 Marshmallow yet. and the setup can only be preformed via smartphone. luckily i had an older tablet that i used to complete the setup, but pretty much i have a regular thermostat that cost me over a hundred dollars and i cannot use any smart app features nor GeoFence options until HoneyWell release updated app that support android 6.0 Mashmallow. very basic installation instruction. so if you are not comfortable with wiring thermostats, i suggest paying a contractor to do it. only instruction on package are "install Thermostat, download app, go through setup through app"
customer_reviews.author: mahmoud hassan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality from Honeywell.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with quality of this thermostat. A little difficult to install but Honeywell support was there to assist.
customer_reviews.author: D. E

customer_reviews.title: Best Thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome works exactly as advertised. Great for homes where you come and go alot. 5 starts all around. very east to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Peters

customer_reviews.title: It will switch from heat to cool and back automatically
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do what you tell it. It will switch from heat to cool and back automatically. I'm getting ready to buy a second one and see how they work together.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this store. I bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from this store. I bought this product in Jan 16 and it is not working any longer. Called Honeywell and said the product was made in 2014 and the warranty is no longer valid.... I basically bought a "new" product that was already out of warranty
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan K.

customer_reviews.title: but we love it
customer_reviews.text: Not very user friendly at first, but we love it now
customer_reviews.author: Cmitchell

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade to traditional thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I installed this very quickly (just follow the app instructions and take a picture of your previous thermostat wires). The product works very well, its a little weird figuring out how to actually control your heating and cooling over a schedule as I like to do. Geofencing is nice but when I'm home I like the thermostat to decrease heat in winter and let the house heat up in summer while we are sleeping. It uses apps to do this which took a minute to figure out but it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S.

customer_reviews.title: ... not working well but overall it s convenient and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Geofencing is not working well but overall it s convenient and easy to install. I will recommend the product
customer_reviews.author: Jean Vincenot

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I lost my money, it work just 1 day, never turn on again
customer_reviews.author: NeilHD

customer_reviews.title: Strong phone support
customer_reviews.text: Syrugfled a bit on install but folks on Lyric help line were terriffic. Love controlling temperature remote ly
customer_reviews.author: Steve Glusman

customer_reviews.title: It seemed flimsy and felt like it was going to fall off the wall
customer_reviews.text: The attachment point needs to be redesigned. It seemed flimsy and felt like it was going to fall off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: James Engall

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat i own 2.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best thermostat on the market. I own 2 and the app is great. Dont know why people dont like it. Took me 10 minutes to install and 10 more to get working.
customer_reviews.author: Drake C.

customer_reviews.title: Lacking instructions
customer_reviews.text: If unit does what it is suppose to I think I will like it BUT there was no detailed installation info provided. I have had to e-mail Lyric to set it up the way I want it. I am still trying to get the display to be illuminated all the time even after I added a common wire. Very disappointed with electronic and paper installation instructions!
customer_reviews.author: bob h

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The equipment arrived on time and in good working condition like it said in the description. Definitely 5 star!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawie74

customer_reviews.title: Better, more reliable and more simple than Nest
customer_reviews.text: Better, more reliable and more simple than Nest. I've had nothing but problems with Nest (they are learning as they go). Go with the experience and reliability of Honeywell and don't be fooled by Nest being a "first" in WiFi/Smart thermostats. Honeywell did this long ago and are doing it again better than anybody.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Not ready!
customer_reviews.text: After $350 to pay for installation (which I normally do myself) this unit couldn't process heat from a heat pump and lower temp boiler system. Lots of wasted money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would find something else to use, I have two and constant problems
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Still not working.......
customer_reviews.text: After 12 hrs on line with Support still don't have this working. Taking a few weeks off before trying again. I have to get a my local furnace maintenance guy to go over how to answer advanced questions. Or it could be a bad unit. I get a constant fan but the compressor doesn't kick in to cool.
customer_reviews.author: James Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Love this thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermostat. We bought one for our main living space and liked it so much that we got a second for our bedroom. Easy to program. The wifi interface is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to set up ended up returning just didn't fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MR J

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is not user friendly. Having a hard time making it work for me
customer_reviews.author: Ms

customer_reviews.title: cause it's better looking than the Nest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an alternative to a Nest Gen 3, I have the Nest in the other zone. It was 100 less than original msrp, same as nest gen 3. This is no nest, I wish I would've spent the extra 100 on a nest. The software is very limited in it's capabilities. I hope that Honeywell spends sometime in making the software as robust as the Nest, cause it's better looking than the Nest.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: despite our research it didn't work in our home, continually drained the battery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work with Android Marshmallow!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY if you have an ANDROID MARSHMALLOW operating system on your phone. The app is not yet compatible with system. There is no fix. They could not tell me when the update will occur. Honeywell Customer Service was polite but could not answer any of my questions and could not come up with any type of solution. I'd be returning this if the contractor wasn't standing in my house right now.
customer_reviews.author: Kenosha

customer_reviews.title: Near less useless as a remote device
customer_reviews.text: Looses conductivity to the wireless that is less than 30 feet away. I have 5, in 2 homes and have to re boot all the time. Near less useless as a remote device. Works well if you are home, but so did the $19.95 one it replaced .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not Nest
customer_reviews.text: Good, but not Nest, but I think we will figure out eventually how to use the app on two phones, just haven't figured it out yet. But think it may just be a reasonable price as is the produce. In comparing to nest.
customer_reviews.author: S. Massey

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, buy a nest instead. Seriously, this thing is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lyric RCH9300WF Wi-Fi Thermostat
product_meta.description: Features. Lyric Wi-Fi thermostat. Uses your smart phones location to optimize savings convenience. Automatically maintains comfort by considering temperature. Humidity weather. No complex menus. 1 touch buttons on the thermostat app saves you time. Control from anywhere by smart-phone or tablet. New app combines simplicity with advanced features for a unique user experience. View weather outlook so you can plan. Dimension - 7 x 4 x 7.13 in. Item weight - 1.4 lbs.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars103 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
